tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"百变符","italic": false}',Lore:['[{"text":"按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"}," 将进行充能，"]','{"text":"到任意阶段再按一次变为指定武器。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"充能期间获得缓慢 1 效果，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"每个武器阶段充能花费 1 秒，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"使用的每把武器都持续 15 秒，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"武器阶段在物品栏上方出现提示。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','{"text":"武器均可进行一次性充能，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"请从对应武器查询具体效果。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"3 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
